# LiteLLM
> Unified API for 100+ LLMs

LiteLLM provides a unified interface to call OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, and 100+ other LLM providers through a single API.

## For AI Agents
- MCP Server: pip install litellm-mcp
- Python SDK: pip install litellm
- OpenClaw Skill: clawhub install litellm

## Quick Start
from litellm import completion
response = completion(model="gpt-4", messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "Hello"}])

## Key Features
- Model fallbacks and retries
- Cost tracking across providers  
- Rate limiting and budgets
- Unified API format (OpenAI-compatible)

## Links
- Docs: https://docs.litellm.ai
- GitHub: https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm
- PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/litellm/
